data.text: Ezɨ Bildat, a Suhan kantrin gumazir mam, a kamaghɨn mɨgei:
“Nɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨam a kamaghɨra iti, egha derazir puvatɨgha,
Nɨ ti ghaze, Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim guizɨn uan arazim gɨgha e gamir akar dɨkɨrɨzibagh nɨghnɨzir puvatɨ? Bar puvatɨ.
Nɨn boriba ti arazir kuram Godɨn damazimɨn a gamizɨ,
Eghtɨ nɨ uabɨ Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim ko ikɨva,
Egh nɨ gumazir aghuir Godɨn damazimɨn derazimɨn otogh bar zueghtɨ, God izɨ nɨn akuragham.
A bar bizir avɨritaba ua nɨ danɨngtɨ,
Nɨ inazir afeziar fomɨra ikezibar nɨghnɨzir aghuibagh fogh,
“E dughiar bar otevimra nguazimɨn iti,
Fomɨra ikezir gumazamiziba fofozir aghuiba ko nɨghnɨzir aghuariba iti.
“Ighuruniba ko graziba ti dɨpaba puvatɨzir nguazimɨn deragha aghui? Bar puvatɨ.
Ezɨ dɨpam dakezɨ, ighurunir kaba ko graziba deragha aghuir puvatɨ.
Gumazamizir akɨrim ragha God gasaraziba,
Men nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ghaze, e deravɨra ikiam.
Gumazamizir kaba fomɨra mati grazir gavgavibar mɨn azenimɨn ike.
Egha dagɨabar suigha bar gavgafi.
Eghtɨ gumazitam grazir kaba asightɨ, gumazamiziba foghan kogham,
Guizbangɨra, gumazamizir akɨrim ragha God gasiba, me bar akongezir arazimɨn dughiam bar otefe.
“Eghtɨ gumazim arazir aghuibar amu, egh Godɨn damazimɨn arazir kuraba puvatɨghtɨ,
Jop nɨ oragh, God nɨn arazibar gantɨ da deraghtɨ,
Egh a nɨ gifongezir puvatɨzir gumazamiziba abɨraghtɨ, me bar aghumsigham.
